name: CodeArt Units Converter
author: CodeIsArt.NET

sections.description:
The CodeArt Units Converter allows you to easily add online conversion calculators for many types of measurement units.

Plugin & API Documentation

Key features

  • Weight units converter
  • Speed units converter
  • Area units converter

Need help?

If you have any feature requests, need more hooks, or maybe have even found a bug, please let us know in the support forum or contact us at https://support.codeisart.net. We look forward to hearing from you!

You can also check out the documentation pages, as they contain the most essential information on what the plugin can do for you.
sections.installation:
Manual installation

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/codeart-units-converter directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress Plugins page directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins page in WordPress.
  3. Use the CodeArt Units Converter â†’ Settings page to configure the plugin.

Installation through WordPress

  1. Open up your WordPress Dashboard and navigate to the Plugins page.
  2. Click on Add new
  3. In the search bar type “CodeArt Units Converter”
  4. Select this plugin and click on Install now

Important

.
sections.faq:
How many converters available?

Currently 3 converters and we are working on add more converters.

upgrade_notice.1.0.3: clear browser cache and purge wordpress cache if used.
upgrade_notice.1.0.0: There is no specific upgrade process for the initial release. Simply install the plugin and you're good to go!
